00033 class OscillatoryPoissonParameter
00034         : public ManageableInput
00035 {
00036 protected:
00037     OscillatoryPoissonParameter(std::ifstream & is) {
00038         std::string test;
00039         READ_FROM_FILE(is, constant_, "constant", "OscillatoryPoissonParameter")
00040         READ_FROM_FILE(is, amplitude_, "amplitude", "OscillatoryPoissonParameter")
00041         double freq;
00042         READ_FROM_FILE(is, freq, "freq", "OscillatoryPoissonParameter")
00043         omega_ = 3.14159265358979 * 2 * freq;
00044         READ_FROM_FILE(is, phase_, "phase", "OscillatoryPoissonParameter")
00045     }
00046     double spontaneous_rate_;
00047 private:
00048     void input_update() {
00049         spontaneous_rate_ = constant_ + amplitude_ * sin(omega_ * SimEnv::sim_time() + phase_);
00050     }
00051     double constant_;
00052     double amplitude_;
00053     double omega_;
00054     double phase_;
00055 };
